title: Putin assassination calls still prohibited, says Meta, as Russians evade Internet blocks
content:
Meta has said that Putin assassination calls are still prohibited on Facebook and Instagram, clarifying an earlier statement which temporarily permitted calls for violence against Russian invaders in Ukraine …

more…

The post Putin assassination calls still prohibited, says Meta, as Russians evade Internet blocks appeared first on 9to5Mac.
